title: Looking for a serif with ornaments / simple flourishes
content:
Hi all,

I'm looking for a serif font (Initial Caps) which has nice ornaments/  
flourishes which give it a cool feminine and storybook feel.

Any recommendations would be amazing. Thanks.

Attached is a ref of the kind of thing i'm after.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140331084436im_/http:/typophile.com/files/A_5421.jpg)
author: mrPMG

comments.content: I like [Ivory](http://web.archive.org/web/20140331084436/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/facetype/ivory) and [Azalleia](http://web.archive.org/web/20140331084436/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/intellecta/azalleia). I guess having a look to some tags at MyFonts would give you more better suggestions: ' [Ornamental](http://web.archive.org/web/20140331084436/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/tag%3Aornamental)', ' [Ornaments](http://web.archive.org/web/20140331084436/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/tag%3Aornaments)', ' [Flourish](http://web.archive.org/web/20140331084436/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/tag%3Aflourish)', ' [Floral](http://web.archive.org/web/20140331084436/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/tag%3Afloral)', ' [Flowers](http://web.archive.org/web/20140331084436/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/tag%3Aflowers)'
